name: Elsia War
description:
Turn-Based Battle

This classic turn-based strategy game follows a speed order system.
Utilize each character's effectiveness and status resistance to gain the upper hand, and use a variety of skills to defeat your enemies.
There are 35 stages to complete in the main storyline and a total of 50 stages to conquer on all routes. The game offers approximately 20 hours of gameplay.
Players can also take on additional challenges once they have completed the game.

Story & Characters

With over 50 unique characters, this game depicts the struggles between multiple factions on the continent of Elsia.
Relationships are tested and grudges are formed as the story unfolds.

Decision

With numerous dialogue choices, your decisions will greatly impact the game's outcome.
Your choices can affect relationships, character life and death, and the progression of the storyline.

Award Medal

Grant honors to your characters to strengthen their abilities, expand their equipment, and upgrade their skills.

War Table

Assign members to complete additional political tasks to improve the support for your faction.
Earn sponsorships and new equipment in the process.

Controls

[Keyboard] (Mouse control available)
WASD / ↑ ← ↓ →: Arrow
Enter / Space: OK
Esc / Num0: Cancel
Ctrl: Skip dialogue
Page up / Page down: Next page or back to the active unit

[Gamepad] (XBOX example)
D-pad / left analog stick: Arrow
A: OK
B: Cancel
X: Skip dialogue
LB / RB: Next page or back to the active unit
Right analog stick: Mouse operation
